CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Academy relative to Nova Institute?
SRP.A: Luminara Academy is {below} Nova Institute in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Institute relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Nova Institute is {above} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara Academy}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Academy's maximum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy's maximum Publication Count is in {1961}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Academy's minimum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy's minimum Publication Count is in {1977}.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1971, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1971 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1960 and 1971 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1976, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1967 and 1976 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1986, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1975 and 1986 was {larger} than between 1966 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Publication Count in 1959 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total publication count in 1959 was {higher} than in 1983.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Institute} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara Academy and Nova Institute first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara Academy and Nova Institute did not exchange leading positions.
